name.ja: ミラァと<ruby>燐寸之仔<rt>マッチノコ</rt></ruby>

text.en: If this card is in your hand: You can reveal 3 cards from your hand and/or Deck with the same name as cards in your opponent's GY, but different names from each other, and if you do, Special Summon this card. When your opponent activates a card or effect (Quick Effect): You can send this card Summoned by its own effect to the GY; send 1 card with the same name as that opponent's card from your Deck or Extra Deck to the GY, and if you do, negate the activation. You can only use each effect of "Mirah and Matchnoko" once per turn.
